summary.span: 表示实现 的集合的 ，例如 Microsoft ActiveX 数据对象 (ADO) 数据视图。

span.span: Represents the for collections that implement , such as Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) data views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有集合都具有默认 。All collections have a default . 对于实现 或 的集合，将 默认集合视图。For collections that implement or , the default collection view is . 具体而言， 是 所必需的，而 是提供其他排序和筛选支持的可选接口。Specifically, is required for , and is an optional interface that gives additional sorting and filtering support. 如果有多个 对象，而基础源是 `DataTable` 或 `DataView`，则视图对象不会单独进行排序或筛选。If you have multiple objects and the underlying source is a `DataTable` or a `DataView`, the view objects do not sort or filter independently. 例如，如果有两个 对象与同一个 `DataTable` 相关联，并且对其中一个视图执行排序，则另一个视图中项的顺序可能会受到影响。For example, if you have two objects associated with the same `DataTable` and you perform sorting on one of the views, the order of items in the other view can be affected. 这是因为 对象使用基础 来排序和筛选功能。This is because objects use the underlying for sorting and filtering functionalities. 有关集合视图的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview)。For more information about collection views, see [Data Binding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview).

summary.span: 开始添加事务并返回挂起的新项。

span.span: Starts an add transaction and returns the pending new item.
The pending new item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 会开始添加事务。Calling begins an add transaction. 应调用 或 来结束添加事务。You should call or to end the add transaction. 新项始终出现在 "集合" 视图中。A new item always appears in the collection view. 在调用 时，应用于该视图的任何筛选、排序或分组都会应用于新项。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called.

span.span: if a new item can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未发生编辑事务，则 可以为集合创建新项; 如果集合不是固定大小，则为; 如果集合不是只读的，则为。The can create a new item for the collection if there is not an edit transaction occurring, if the collection is not a fixed size, and if the collection is not read-only.

value.span: 如果集合视图可以放弃挂起的更改并还原所编辑对象的原始值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果编辑的项实现了 接口，则 `true` 。 is `true` if the edited item implements the interface. 如果 `false`，请调用 以使视图退出编辑状态，并提供逻辑来还原所编辑的对象的更改。If is `false`, call to cause the view to exit the edit state and provide logic to revert the changes on the object that was edited.

summary.span: 结束编辑事务，并还原项的原始值（如有可能）。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and, if possible, restores the original value to the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `null`，并使集合视图退出编辑状态。 sets to `null` and causes the collection view to exit the edit state. 如果 `true`， 还会还原已编辑对象的原始值。If is `true`, also restores the original values of the edited object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中的记录的估计数。

span.span: Gets the estimated number of records in the collection.

value.span: 下列类型作之一：

span.span: One of the following:
Value
Meaning
Could not determine the count of the collection.

description.span: 此值可能由“虚拟化”视图返回，这时视图特意不考虑基础集合中的所有项，因为它尝试提高效率，尽量降低整个集合始终都可用这一要求。

span.span: This might be returned by a "virtualizing" view, where the view deliberately does not account for all items in the underlying collection because the view is attempting to increase efficiency and minimize dependence on always having the entire collection available.
any other integer
The count of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此计数表示筛选的计数。Note that this count represents the filtered count.

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义筛选器。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom filter.

value.span: 用于指定项的筛选方式的字符串。

span.span: A string that specifies how the items are filtered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来测试视图是否支持自定义筛选，然后再将字符串分配给此属性。Use the property to test whether the view supports custom filtering before assigning a string to this property. 语法取决于 实现。The syntax depends on the implementation. 有关支持的筛选表达式语法的示例，请参阅 。For an example of the supported filter expression syntax, see . 请注意，如果有多个 对象，而基础源是 `DataTable` 或 `DataView`，则视图对象不会单独进行排序或筛选。Note that if you have multiple objects and the underlying source is a `DataTable` or a `DataView`, the view objects do not sort or filter independently. 例如，如果有两个 对象与同一个 `DataTable` 相关联，并且对其中一个视图执行排序，则另一个视图中项的顺序可能会受到影响。For example, if you have two objects associated with the same `DataTable` and you perform sorting on one of the views, the order of items in the other view can be affected. 这是因为 对象使用基础 来排序和筛选功能。This is because objects use the underlying for sorting and filtering functionalities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 仅可通过访问集合对象并使用其各种方法（例如 Add）来设置此属性。This property can only be set by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as Add. 用于访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的;集合本身是可读/写的。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only; the collection itself is read/write. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性：The following example shows how to use this property: [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#6)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据绑定演示](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDataInGroupOrder { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsDataInGroupOrder : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示项列表在应用排序功能和筛选器（如果有）后是否已处于可以进行分组的正确顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the list of items (after applying the sort and filters, if any) is already in the correct order for grouping.

value.span: 如果项列表已处于可以进行分组的正确顺序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 `true` 会通知视图：项列表已经按正确的顺序进行分组，并允许视图使用更有效的算法来生成组。Setting this property to `true` informs the view that the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping and allows the view to use a more efficient algorithm to build the groups. 如果是以下情况，数据的顺序是正确的：The data is in the correct order if: 1. 属于给定组的所有项会连续出现，All items belonging to a given group appear consecutively, and 2. 如果 集合非空，则 中的组将出现在任何其他组之前，并按 中的相同顺序显示。If the collection is non-empty, the groups in appear before any other groups, and in the same order as in .

span.span: if the specified item belongs to the view or if there is not filter set on the collection view; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 方法不同，此方法假定指定项属于基础集合。Unlike the method, this method assumes that the specified item belongs to the underlying collection. 此方法使用筛选器。This method takes filters into account. 通常，在集合更改通知期间使用此方法来确定已添加或已删除的项是否需要处理。Typically, you use this method during collection-changed notifications to determine if the added or removed item requires processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed
abstract member RemoveAt : int -> unit override this.RemoveAt : int -> unit

param.name: index
param.span: 要删除的项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item to remove.

summary.span: 从集合中删除指定位置的项。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified position from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index` 相对于集合视图，而不是集合。`index` is relative to the collection view, not the collection. 例如，如果集合包含10个项，而视图有 以便显示7个项，则 `index` 的有效值为0到6。For example, if the collection has 10 items and the view has a so that 7 items appear, the valid values of `index` are 0 through 6.

exception.span: 小于 0 或大于集合视图中的项数。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the number of items in the collection view.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SortDescriptions As SortDescriptionCollection

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，该集合描述集合中的项在视图中的排序方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that describes how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.

value.span: 对象的集合，这些对象描述集合中的项在视图中的排序方式。

span.span: A collection of objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，如果有多个 对象，而基础源是 `DataTable` 或 `DataView`，则视图对象不会单独进行排序或筛选。Note that if you have multiple objects and the underlying source is a `DataTable` or a `DataView`, the view objects do not sort or filter independently. 例如，如果有两个 对象与同一个 `DataTable` 相关联，并且对其中一个视图执行排序，则另一个视图中项的顺序可能会受到影响。For example, if you have two objects associated with the same `DataTable` and you perform sorting on one of the views, the order of items in the other view can be affected. 这是因为 对象使用基础 来排序和筛选功能。This is because objects use the underlying for sorting and filtering functionalities. > [!NOTE] > 仅可通过访问集合对象并使用它的各种方法（如 `Add`）来设置此属性。This property can only be set by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 用于访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的;集合本身是可读/写的。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only; the collection itself is read/write.

span.span: First object to compare.
Second object to compare.

summary.span: 此成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不能在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

returns.span: 小于零意味着 小于 ，零值意味着它们相等，大于零则意味着 大于 。

span.span: Less than zero means is less than , a value of zero means they are equal, and over zero means is greater than .
